about_the_game:
Dungeon Weiqi is a pixel-art roguelike card game primarily inspired by the ancient game of Weiqi.

Weiqi Style Card Combat

Deploy cards using Crystals that regenerate automatically each turn.

Once placed on the chessboard, cards autonomously attack adjacent enemies at round's end.

Try to occupy advantageous positions and surround the enemy to create more advantages!

Your Lord enters battle as a card. Will you use the lord's powerful abilities to charge forward, or protect them in the rear and seek victory? The choice is yours!

Diverse Factions & Card Types

Players can choose from multiple factions. You can collect unique cards, and form the most suitable deck to fight!

There are three types of cards for both the enemy and us: Warrior Cards | Skill Cards | Structure Cards.

Master their synergies to overturn desperate situations!

Enemies also possess unique cards and combat styles. Be careful to deal with them and familiarize yourself with their combat styles and weaknesses. Then victory is yours!

Explore the Map Freely

Avoiding strong enemies or engaging in direct combat? The decision is entirely yours! You can freely plan your path, choose the order of battle with enemies, or even completely ignore them (if you are willing to give up the treasure they are guarding).

Be careful with your supplies. Every step further will cost your food. If the food runs out, you will be at a huge disadvantage and even lose the entire game! Plan your path carefully to avoid the worst-case situation.

short_description: Dungeon Weiqi is a card roguelike strategy game. In this game, the player assume the role of a kingdom's lord. Through your journey, you'll collect cards, construct decks, progressively empower your capabilities, and confront escalating challenges."
